channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver AS for JAVA (HTTP Service)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver AS for JAVA (HTTP Service)

item.title: CVE-2021-21492|2024-08-03T18:16:22.651Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20netweaver%20as%20for%20java%20%28http%20service%29
item.description: SAP NetWeaver Application Server Java(HTTP Service), versions - 7.10, 7.11, 7.20, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, 7.50, does not sufficiently validate logon group in URLs, resulting in a content spoofing vulnerability when directory listing is enabled.
